name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！＂アニソン Night Fever!!＂【#角巻わため生誕祭2025】 [rhgRzAgYKDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko and Tsunomaki Watame perform 'Catch You Catch Me' on stage.
Transition scene with visual effects as Tsunomaki Watame changes outfits and walks across the stage.
Tsunomaki Watame performs 'Fatale' with guest performer Kano.

subtitles.original: パワー爆発しちゃう
subtitles.english: My power is about to explode

subtitles.original: お願い お願い お願い お願い
subtitles.english: Please, please, please, please

subtitles.original: まだねお友達かな
subtitles.english: Are we still just friends?

subtitles.original: 笑って見つめて楽しい毎日にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to smile and look at you, and make every day fun

subtitles.original: ほら Catch You Catch You Catch Me Catch Me ゼッタイ
subtitles.english: Look, I'll definitely Catch You Catch Me

subtitles.original: 運命だって お似合いだって そう
subtitles.english: Because it's fate, because we're a perfect match, yes

subtitles.original: Nice to Meet You Good to See You きっと
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you, good to see you, surely

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない あなたに世界で一番
subtitles.english: I won't lose to anyone, to you, the most in the world

subtitles.original: コ・イ・シ・テ・ル
subtitles.english: I'm in love with you

subtitles.original: また夢から覚める 濡れた瞼を開ける
subtitles.english: Waking from a dream again, opening my wet eyelids

subtitles.original: 狂おしいほど思い残す 遠い日の無力を呪う
subtitles.english: Left with regrets so intense it's maddening, cursing the helplessness of distant days

subtitles.original: 身を焼かれるような絶望も糧にはなろうか
subtitles.english: Will even the despair that feels like it's burning my body become nourishment?

subtitles.original: 憧れに焦がれるまま燃やし続けている
subtitles.english: Continuing to burn while longing for my aspirations

subtitles.original: キラキラな星様したあなたのeyes
subtitles.english: Your eyes, like twinkling stars

subtitles.original: カラカラ渇いて可哀想なlack of 愛？
subtitles.english: Parched and pitiful, a lack of love?

subtitles.original: 全てを孤独から救う眩しい光
subtitles.english: A dazzling light that saves everything from loneliness

subtitles.original: 僕にだけ落ちる shadow はあなたのせい？
subtitles.english: Is the shadow falling only on me your fault?

subtitles.original: 致命的な欠落をくれたね
subtitles.english: You gave me a fatal deficiency

subtitles.original: 身勝手な巨星 狂わされた生
subtitles.english: A selfish giant star, a life driven mad

subtitles.original: お願い、声を聞かせて、声を聞かせて
subtitles.english: Please, let me hear your voice, let me hear your voice

subtitles.original: 絡まって歪んでしまった僕らに
subtitles.english: To us, who have become entangled and distorted

subtitles.original: くれたのはあなただけ、あなただけ
subtitles.english: The one who gave it was only you, only you

subtitles.original: (ああ、あなただけ、あなただけ)
subtitles.english: (Ah, only you, only you)

subtitles.original: お願い、僕を見ていて、僕を見ていて
subtitles.english: Please, keep looking at me, keep looking at me

subtitles.original: 宿命に刻まれた痛みさえ武器にして
subtitles.english: Turning even the pain carved into destiny into a weapon

subtitles.original: いつかの後悔すら照らせるように
subtitles.english: So that even someday's regrets can be illuminated

subtitles.original: あなたがいないと生きていけない
subtitles.english: I can't live without you

subtitles.original: 何もかも捧げてしまっていい
subtitles.english: It's fine to sacrifice everything

subtitles.original: あなたの愛がまだ足りない
subtitles.english: Your love is still not enough

subtitles.original: 欠けたものは何で埋めたらいい？
subtitles.english: What should I fill the missing pieces with?

subtitles.original: 致命的、致命的、致命的な愛
subtitles.english: Fatal, fatal, fatal love

subtitles.original: 運命的、運命的、運命的な愛
subtitles.english: Fateful, fateful, fateful love

subtitles.original: 必然的、必然的、必然的な哀
subtitles.english: Inevitable, inevitable, inevitable sorrow

subtitles.original: 僕を見ていてね
subtitles.english: Keep looking at me

subtitles.original: 最愛のファタール！
subtitles.english: My dearest Fatale!

subtitles.original: キラキラな星様したあなたのeyes
subtitles.english: Your eyes, like twinkling stars

subtitles.original: カラカラ渇いて可哀想なlack of 愛？
subtitles.english: Parched and pitiful, a lack of love?

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方から放たれた美しさに
subtitles.english: At the beauty emitted from far, far away

subtitles.original: 灼かれた眼、捥がれた羽、創造的堕天
subtitles.english: Burned eyes, torn wings, a creative fall from grace

subtitles.original: あらゆる視界をジャック その輝きはエゴイスティック
subtitles.english: Hijacking all fields of vision, that brilliance is egoistic

subtitles.original: 胸の奥仕舞った感傷さえ引っ張り出して昇華して
subtitles.english: Pulling out even the sentimentality hidden deep in my heart and sublimating it

subtitles.original: 僕という運命を全部抱きしめてゆく
subtitles.english: I'll embrace all of the destiny that is me

subtitles.original: あなたがいないと生きていけない
subtitles.english: I can't live without you

subtitles.original: 眩しさでこの身を照らして欲しい
subtitles.english: I want you to illuminate this body with brilliance

subtitles.original: あなたの愛がまだ足りない
subtitles.english: Your love is still not enough

subtitles.original: 夢の中で貰うしかないのに
subtitles.english: Even though I can only receive it in a dream

subtitles.original: 致命的、致命的、致命的な愛
subtitles.english: Fatal, fatal, fatal love

subtitles.original: 運命的、運命前、運命的な愛
subtitles.english: Fateful, fateful, fateful love

subtitles.original: 必然的、必然的、必然的な哀
subtitles.english: Inevitable, inevitable, inevitable sorrow

subtitles.original: 誰のものでもない 最愛のファタール！
subtitles.english: Belonging to no one, my dearest Fatale!

subtitles.original: 何度悔やんだだろう 何度呪っただろう
subtitles.english: How many times have I regretted it? How many times have I cursed it?

subtitles.original: どれほどの幸福を注いだとしても
subtitles.english: No matter how much happiness I pour in

subtitles.original: 満たされることのない器
subtitles.english: A vessel that can never be filled

subtitles.original: 何度夢見ただろう 何度願っただろう
subtitles.english: How many times have I dreamed of it? How many times have I wished for it?

subtitles.original: 僕の胸で膿み続けている傷を撫でる手を
subtitles.english: For a hand to stroke the wound that continues to fester in my chest
